hero.headline: Deploy AI Teams — Not More AI Tools
hero.subhead: Pattern Agentic helps you define, deploy, and scale full AI teams using purpose-driven specs and infrastructure-aware orchestration.

why_pattern.subhead: From prototype to production — without the chaos. Pattern is the missing infrastructure layer for deploying, scaling, and managing real AI teams.

problems.title: The Problem with Today’s AI Tooling
items: Orchestration is glued together by hand
Public clouds force you into their stack
No unified view of cost, quality, or risk

solutions.title: What Pattern Agentic Delivers
items: Define agent teams in a deployable spec
Deploy across cloud, edge, or on-prem
Monitor teams by outcome, not just compute usage
Scale resources automatically based on real demand

why_pattern.conclusion: You’re not just deploying agents. You’re running an AI workforce that deserves the same clarity, performance, and reliability as any mission-critical system.

intro.heading: Why Pattern?
intro.body: Today’s AI tooling is built for experimentation — not deployment. Pattern Agentic makes it simple to go from a working agent prototype to a fully orchestrated, resource-optimized team in production.

cards.title: Define Your AI Team
cards.body: Use a simple Pattern Spec to describe purpose-driven teams: support agents, engineering squads, or HR workflows.

cards.title: Choose Your Components
cards.body: Select models from any source, integrate tools, memory, RAG chains, and your own MCPs.

cards.title: Deploy Anywhere
cards.body: Deploy in the cloud of your choice, at the edge, or in your own data center — with native optimization for price and performance.

cards.title: Scale by KPIs
cards.body: Scale agent workloads based on real-world demand: ticket volume, dev task throughput, hiring funnel velocity.

agent_workload_management.subhead: From deployment to optimization, the Pattern platform ensures every model, agent, and tool runs exactly where it should — with full control, visibility, and continuous improvement.

blocks.title: Run the Right Model, on the Right Architecture, Every Time
blocks.body: Pattern intelligently deploys any model — public, private, fine-tuned, or hybrid — across your preferred infrastructure. Whether you're using APIs, containers, or fully self-hosted frameworks, the system ensures the model runs on the right architecture with appropriate memory, GPU, and isolation — all configured in your pattern spec.

blocks.title: Built for Real-World Stacks
blocks.body: Bring your orchestration logic, data pipelines, memory systems, and RAG setups. Pattern lets you connect to cloud-native services or self-managed systems with no vendor lock-in and clean, reusable specs. You define the composition — we deploy the environment.

blocks.title: Smarter Resource Optimization
blocks.body: Pattern monitors all AI infrastructure — from GPUs and TPUs to CPU-heavy inference nodes — and continuously rebalances workloads to optimize cost, latency, and throughput. Idle pods are consolidated. Hot workloads are burst-scaled. No ops engineer required.

blocks.title: Impact-Based Autoscaling That Matches Business Demand
blocks.body: Pattern doesn’t scale just based on metrics like CPU or GPU usage. It scales based on results: customer wait times, completion quality, workflow latency, or job throughput. Each spec can define the conditions that matter most — and Pattern handles the rest.

blocks.title: Control center for your AI workforce.
blocks.body: Track your deployed AI teams in real time. Define KPIs that align with business goals and monitor them over time. Get alerted to agent or system health issues as they arise. Access a live infrastructure view — spanning clusters, services, APIs, and orchestration layers — and manage integrations with your tools, environments, and partners. From CRM and engineering platforms to public cloud, SaaS, and self-managed systems, it’s your control plane for purpose-driven AI.

blocks.title: Continuous operational intelligence, built in.
blocks.body: The Pattern AI Ops Agent continuously inspects your multi-agent workloads for signs of inefficiency, drift, or degradation. It identifies misconfigurations, unstable network paths, underperforming agents, and infrastructure-level issues — and responds with adjustments that reflect your business priorities. Think of it as a 24×7 agentic co-pilot ensuring your AI deployments stay healthy, performant, and aligned — without waiting for human intervention.
